data.text: My child is happy at Greenwood High School
My child feels safe at Greenwood High School
The school helps my child reach their full potential
Does your child have special educational needs and/or disabilities (SEND)?
My child has SEND, and the school gives them the support they need to succeed.
The school is well led and managed
The school gives my child the opportunity to learn across a broad range of subjects
My child has the opportunity to attend clubs and activities during lunchtime, or before or after school
My child’s school helps them develop as a person
My child’s school deals fairly with children's behaviour
I’m confident that the school deals with bullying quickly and effectively
The school keeps me updated about my child’s progress
The school keeps me well informed about what my child will be learning throughout the year
I would recommend this school to another parent
